material: neoprene-coated cast iron dumbbells with plastic rack
usage: Used for strength training and fitness exercises such as curls, presses, lunges, squats and general home or gym workouts.
key_features: Neoprene dumbbells are versatile and easy to use
Suitable for a variety of workout routines at home or in a commercial gym
Designed with flat bottoms so dumbbells will not roll away when placed on the ground
Neoprene coating reduces noise and impact when dropped
Built using a high quality cast iron core
Ergonomic handles providing a secure, comfortable grip
Can be used for bicep curls, tricep extensions, lunges, squats, cardio, and shoulder press
ai_description: Compact multicolor neoprene dumbbell set featuring six hex-shaped weights in yellow, red and purple, each clearly marked with the KAKSS logo and weight (1 kg, 1.5 kg, 2 kg). The dumbbells rest on a black A-frame plastic stand with curved slots, creating a tidy, vertical display.
target_audience: Home fitness users, gym-goers, and commercial gym owners seeking compact, color-coded dumbbells with a storage rack.
product_name: Kakss Neoprene Dumbbells sets for Gym Exercise (1kg+1.5kg+2kg Pair, Dumbbell With Stand) (Multicolor)
